metadata.title: CVE-2024-23196 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's sound/hda device driver insnd_hdac_regmap_sync() function. This can result in a null pointerdereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of serviceissue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-23196` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

No subscription required
